metadata.raw:
Tukera Freighter Type AT (Civilian Starship)

The Tukera freighter is a standard Tukera transport ship design, and provides freight handling service along many Tukera routes in the Imperium. Tukera's freighters sport a variety of names, often vaguely reminiscent of advertising slogans: Golden Harvest, Safety First, and Star Lines, for examples.

CraftID: Type AT Freighter, TL15, MCr814.4
Hull: 2700/6750, Disp=3000, Config=4SL, Armor=40G, Loaded=35765t, Unloaded=15961t
Power: 27/54, Fusion=7200MW, Duration=30 days
Loco: 54/108, Maneuver=1, 135/270, Jump=4, Cruise=750kph, Max=1000kph Agility=1
Comm: Radio=System*2
Sensors: EMS Active(FarOrbit), EMS Passive(Substellar), ActObjScan=Rout, ActObjPin=Rout, PassEnScan=Rout
